@metroid An episode is not the same as a chapter, a chapter is serialized within an arc or an episode. An episode is part of a whole, in this case within a story, but each episode will be focused on a different protagonist or event, which may be related to the main story, in this case hisako. An example of that is that all the events that hisako stars are serialized and named as Lustful berry, and Lustful berry has chapters like escalate0, escalate 1, etc. Similarly Lustful flowers is part of the same story, but it is another episode with its respective chapters. The current work is Haruko's episode, that's why it's not called Lustful berry or Lustful flowers, in any case the next work to come out would be a chapter of that episode ... calling an episode a doujin series or an arc of a story is correct, the term episode is not exclusive of television or anime, in fact it is more attached to literature.
